column1: The Pit Room////This is a nice Bbq joint by my work
column2: the food here was pretty good. I wouldn't call it the best BBQ but it is decent and close to my office so it makes it easier. The vibe and atmosphere of the place is nice and vibrant
column3: I got the brisket and on either thing I can't rmr
column4: and it was pretty good. Overall good Bbq place if you don't want to drive far.
